column17:
This all-in-one Sunflame Juicer Mixer Grinder delivers maximum juice output with its excellent performance. It has one hygienic stainless steel jar & one polycarbonate with hard chrome blades. It also has super-efficient stainless steel juicer mesh for higher yield. It runs on a motor RPM of 18000 with a continuous 30 minutes motor rating. It has a LID jar cover & its motor speed is 2 speed piano type control with pulse function. It also features vacuum feet for stability.
